did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. Public Affairs Education Program.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Tapes of lectures; participants included L. Pearce Williams, James R. McConkey, Allan G. Feldt, John Freccero, Thomas Eisner, Peter Kahn, Walter LaFeber, Mary Beth Norton, William B. Provine, Joel Silbey, Frederick Marcham, Carl Sagan, Michael G. Kammen, Jason Seley, Dale Corson, Urie Bronfenbrenner, and others.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Tapes of lectures; participants included L. Pearce Williams, James R. McConkey, Allan G. Feldt, John Freccero, Thomas Eisner, Peter Kahn, Walter LaFeber, Mary Beth Norton, William B. Provine, Joel Silbey, Frederick Marcham, Carl Sagan, Michael G. Kammen, Jason Seley, Dale Corson, Urie Bronfenbrenner, and others.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University. Public Affairs Education Program. Alumni University Lectures, #4-3-1397. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: A list of the tapes can be found here, starting on page 90: http://rmc.library.cornell.edu/EAD/pdf_guides/Tape_Recording_Inventory.pdf
